entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5: By Scripture Alone—Sola Scriptura | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5: By Scripture Alone—Sola Scriptura | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 5 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "By Scripture Alone—Sola Scriptura". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for April 25 to May 1, 2020.
Reading: 1 Cor. 4:1-6; Titus 1:9. 2 Tim. 1:13; Mark 12:10, 26; Luke 24:27, 44-45; Isa. 8:20
Memory Text: “For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart” (Hebrews 4:12, NKJV).
Sunday (Kenny Shelton) - “Scripture as the Ruling Norm” Monday (Jill Morikone) - “The Unity of Scripture” Tuesday (John Lomacang) - “The Clarity of Scripture” Wednesday (John Dinzey) - “Scripture Interprets Scripture” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “Sola Scriptura and Ellen G. White”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_05.pdf

entry.title: America Shut Down - God's Way Out (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: America Shut Down - God's Way Out (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Pastor Kenny Shelton. As fear and uncertainty spread and a war wages against the Coronavirus pestilence, it appears something much bigger is happening. In the darkest dimensions of earth the Devil constructs ways to destroy God's people and bring his control over the world. Will we lose our freedom's? Is time up? What will the result be of the trials upon the earth and each person? Even though the church doors are closed and the health of the world's population declines, God has a way out. Bible prophecy is being fulfilled right now.
Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Kenny Shelton.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4: The Bible–the Authoritative Source of Our Theology | 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4: The Bible–the Authoritative Source of Our Theology | 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 2, lesson 4 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarters book topic is "How To Interpret Scripture" and this weeks Sabbath School lesson is titled "The Bible–the Authoritative Source of Our Theology". Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's lesson is for April 18 to April 24, 2020.
Reading: Mark 7:1–13; Rom. 2:4; 1 John 2:15–17; 2 Cor. 10:5, 6; John 5:46, 47; John 7:38.
Memory Text: “To the law and to the testimony! If they do not speak according to this word, it is because there is no light in them” (Isaiah 8:20, NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) - “Tradition” Monday (John Dinzey) - “Experience” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) - “Culture” Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - “Reason” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “The Bible”

entry.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Sunday Law | Ryan Day (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Cloudy with a Chance of Sunday Law | Ryan Day (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Sunday Law is a Bible prophecy topic familiar to some. But, whether or not you are familiar with what the Sunday Law is all about, a movement for Sunday sacredness is happening. Recent events occurring in the world reassure us that we are living in the last days of earth's history.
The books of Daniel and Revelation teach us about how the Antichrist will work to bring upon this world the Mark of the Beast. How do the powers of this world play into the law making of such a theme? Watch and listen to this live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Pastor Ryan Day.
Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: Jesus and the Apostles' View of the Bible - Lesson 3: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel - Q2 2020

media:group.media:title: Jesus and the Apostles' View of the Bible - Lesson 3: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel - Q2 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. Join every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Jesus and the Apostles’ View of the Bible” and comes from the adult Bible study guide quarterly book on How To Interpret Scripture. This week's lesson is for April 11 to 17, 2020.
Reading: Matt. 4:1–11; Matt. 22:37–40; Luke 24:13–35, 44, 45; Luke 4:25–27; Acts 4:24–26
Memory Text: “But He answered and said, ‘It is written, “Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God” ’ ” (Matthew 4:4, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) - “It Is Written” Monday (Kenny Shelton) - “Jesus and the Law” Tuesday (Jill Morikone) - “Jesus and All Scripture” Wednesday (John Lomacang) - “Jesus and the Origin and History of the Bible” Thursday (Danny Shelton) - “The Apostles and the Bible”

entry.title: Quarantined | God Warned His People (Live Church)

media:group.media:title: Quarantined | God Warned His People (Live Church)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Pastor John Lomacang. The whole world is in quarantine, some to more a degree than others. A lock-down in an attempt to control a worldwide pandemic. In this time of waiting, many have been forced to turn from their usual activities. Some of these changes have resulted in human suffering. What do you do when everything that you've trusted in and relied on is suddenly gone?
Could it be that God is letting judgment come to the earth as punishment, or as a warning? Does God even have anything to do with all this? The Bible gives us light on the subject. It shows us the measures God took in the past so that His people could remain in safety. It also tells us what He will do in the future and how you can stay spiritually connected during this time. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to these important questions.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: The Origin and Nature of the Bible - Lesson 2: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel - Q2 2020

media:group.media:title: The Origin and Nature of the Bible - Lesson 2: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel - Q2 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. Join every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
This week's Sabbath School lesson is titled "The Origin and Nature of the Bible" and comes from the adult Bible study guide quarterly book on How To Interpret Scripture. This week's lesson is for April 4 to 10, 2020.
Reading: 2 Pet. 1:19-21. 2 Tim. 3:16-17; Deut. 18:18; Exod. 17:14; John 1:14; Heb. 11:3, 6
Memory Text: “For this reason we also thank God without ceasing, because when you received the word of God which you heard from us, you welcomed it not as the word of men, but as it is in truth, the word of God, which also effectively works in you who believe” (1 Thessalonians 2:13, NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) - “The Divine Revelation of the Bible” Monday (Jill Morikone) - “The Process of Inspiration” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) - “The Written Word of God” Wednesday (John Dinzey) - “The Parallel Between Christ and Scripture” Thursday (Ryan Day) - “Understanding the Bible in Faith”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/assets/public/files/lessons/2020/2Q/SE/PDFs/EAQ220_02.pdf
